tool_description: Parses HTML and XML documents to extract clean text content while removing tags, scripts, and unwanted elements.

html_path.description: Path to the HTML or XML file to parse

remove_scripts.description: Whether to remove script and style elements

preserve_links.description: Whether to preserve link URLs in the output

exclude_elements.description: HTML elements to exclude from extraction

error_messages: Invalid HTML file: The file is not valid HTML/XML or cannot be parsed.
File encoding error: Unable to read file with current encoding detection.
Malformed HTML: The HTML structure is too corrupted to parse reliably.
Invalid element names: One or more specified element names are not valid HTML tags.
usage: Provide html_path and configure parsing options for element selection and link preservation. Returns clean text content extracted from HTML structure.

links_found.description: Array of URLs found in the document (if preserve_links enabled)

document_title.description: Document title extracted from HTML head
